# Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and
# folders generated by popular Visual Studio add-ons.

# User-specific files
*.rsuser
*.suo
*.user
*.userosscache
*.sln.docstates

# User-specific files (Mono auto generated)
mono_crash.*

# User-specific files (VSCode)
.history
.idea
*.code-workspace

# User-specific files (VS for Mac)
*.csproj.user
*.csproj.userosscache
*.sln.resharper
*.sln.ide

# Auto generated files (VS for Mac)
.vs/
.vsconfig
.vscode/
.vscode-server/
**/.Rproj.user/
.cache/
bin/
obj/
*.pidb
*.pdb
*.exe
*.dll
*.app
*.log
*.sql
*.sqlite
*.mwb

# Ignore all build files and folders
[Bb]in/
[Oo]bj/

# Ignore NuGet packages folder
packages/
